motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of November 12, 2024 meeting minutes, board appointments resolutions, and construction manager at risk contract for Brook Run Maintenance Facility.

motions.title: Charter Amendment Article II, Section 2.13(a)(4) - Prohibitions (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of Charter Amendment regarding prohibitions, with policy to be developed for employee handbook.

motions.title: Charter Amendment Article II, Section 2.13(e) - Prohibitions (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of Charter Amendment regarding prohibitions (Harris recused herself).

motions.title: Resolution in Support of City of Milton Amicus Brief
motions.description: Approval of resolution in support of the City of Milton's Amicus Brief.

motions.title: Supplemental Benefit Program for First Responders with PTSD
motions.description: Approval of supplemental benefit program for First Responders diagnosed with PTSD.
